Texts.Eng: Mechs are quite useful but their basic mechs are barely space-worthy and generally trash. You'll want to get to a ^orange;Mech Crafting Table^reset; and build some ^green;Stock Mech Legs^reset;.
You can further improve on those legs, too, by upgrading them once more into ^orange;Improved Mech Legs^reset;. The same applies to your Boosters.
